title: Membership Proposal: Wesam Adas
body:
Wesam Adas (@wesdoteth) has attended our weekly calls and contributed valuable input and research in our channels 🏹.

A vote has been created in LexDAO MYSTIC 🧙0x057e820D740D5AAaFfa3c6De08C5c98d990dB00d, proposalIndex 7, to grant Adas 0xb9bc87e399E371100F83ffC51ED44c13DAF576cE 1000 MYSTIC voting shares, 1:1 with the rest of our current membership 🗳️.

Effective votes on Ethereum mainnet can be cast using our basic Etherscan dapp here: https://etherscan.io/address/0x057e820d740d5aaaffa3c6de08c5c98d990db00d#writeContract , calling function #17 submitVoteon proposalIndex 7 with one of the following uintVote values: 0 - ABSTAIN / 1 - YEA / 2 - NEA.

This snapshot serves to record soft consensus and avoid unnecessary network fees.
author: 0xd5B3988eD0AB5ec375E51bB6fd10e205cEC16A2E
